See the data, Pokemon with Stats, that was we used [here](https://www.kaggle.com/abcsds/pokemon).

## Learn about pokemons
* Compare pokemons and see which is stronger based on stats using the Pokemon Match Up.
* Look at the strongest pokemons with the Top Stats Distribution.
* Learn more with thorough analysis of the pokemons' stats
